attributes.action: Abolish Vehicle Road Tax and collect the lost Revenue by fuel duty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We wish the PM to abolish vehicle licenceing duty and collect the revenue through tax on vehicle fuel. Thsi would simplyfy vehicle ownnership and mean that a minority of individuals would not be able to avoid the tax as well as being fairer so that those who use the roads most pay the most.

government_responses.details:
